DataElement.preferredName: Prior Immunotherapy Advanced Disease or Disorder Administered Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days which prior immunotherapy was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Immunotherapy Advanced Disease or Disorder Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.:Far along in course._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:(IM-yoo-no-THER-a-pee) Treatment to stimulate or restore the ability of the immune system to fight infections and other diseases. Also used to lessen side effects that may be caused by some cancer treatments.

Concepts.definition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Far along in course._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of days of prior immunotherapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, Number of days of treatment with immunotherapy for locally advanced Stage III disease
